hizbs.text: wama min dabbatin fi l-ardi illa ʿala l-lahi riz'quha wayaʿlamu mus'taqarraha wamus'tawdaʿaha kullun fi kitabin mubinin

wahuwa alladhi khalaqa l-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin wakana ʿarshuhu ʿala l-mai liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu ʿamalan wala-in qul'ta innakum mabʿuthuna min baʿdi l-mawti layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
wala-in akharna ʿanhumu l-ʿadhaba ila ummatin maʿdudatin layaqulunna ma yahbisuhu ala yawma yatihim laysa masrufan ʿanhum wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
wala-in adhaqna l-insana minna rahmatan thumma nazaʿnaha min'hu innahu layausun kafurun
wala-in adhaqnahu naʿmaa baʿda darraa massathu layaqulanna dhahaba l-sayiatu ʿanni innahu lafarihun fakhurun
illa alladhina sabaru waʿamilu l-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
falaʿallaka tarikun baʿda ma yuha ilayka wadaiqun bihi sadruka an yaqulu lawla unzila ʿalayhi kanzun aw jaa maʿahu malakun innama anta nadhirun wal-lahu ʿala kulli shayin wakilun
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu biʿashri suwarin mith'lihi muf'tarayatin wa-id'ʿu mani is'tataʿtum min duni l-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
fa-illam yastajibu lakum fa-iʿ'lamu annama unzila biʿil'mi l-lahi wa-an la ilaha illa huwa fahal antum mus'limuna
man kana yuridu l-hayata l-dun'ya wazinataha nuwaffi ilayhim aʿmalahum fiha wahum fiha la yub'khasuna
ulaika alladhina laysa lahum fi l-akhirati illa l-naru wahabita ma sanaʿu fiha wabatilun ma kanu yaʿmaluna

afaman kana ʿala bayyinatin min rabbihi wayatluhu shahidun min'hu wamin qablihi kitabu musa imaman warahmatan ulaika yu'minuna bihi waman yakfur bihi mina l-ahzabi fal-naru mawʿiduhu fala taku fi mir'yatin min'hu innahu l-haqu min rabbika walakinna akthara l-nasi la yu'minuna
waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ʿala l-lahi kadhiban ulaika yuʿ'raduna ʿala rabbihim wayaqulu l-ashhadu haulai alladhina kadhabu ʿala rabbihim ala laʿnatu l-lahi ʿala l-zalimina
alladhina yasudduna ʿan sabili l-lahi wayabghunaha ʿiwajan wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
ulaika lam yakunu muʿ'jizina fi l-ardi wama kana lahum min duni l-lahi min awliyaa yudaʿafu lahumu l-ʿadhabu ma kanu yastatiʿuna l-samʿa wama kanu yub'siruna
ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum wadalla ʿanhum ma kanu yaftaruna
la jarama annahum fi l-akhirati humu l-akhsaruna
inna alladhina amanu waʿamilu l-salihati wa-akhbatu ila rabbihim ulaika ashabu l-janati hum fiha khaliduna
